long_description: With dedicated spots for all your cooking supplies, the REI Camp Kitchen keeps you organized so you can spend less time searching for a spatula and more time hiking, biking and relaxing with friends. Place your 2-burner camp stove (sold separately) on the side table; side table can be attached to either side of the main table. Tabletop surfaces are finished with a durable laminate to withstand regular use in the outdoors. Aluminum frame creates a sturdy, weather-resistant structure without the cumbersome weight of heavier materials. 2 heavy-duty, chrome-plated wire shelves provide ample storage space for pots, pans, utensils and food. Vertical pole attaches to the main table and includes a movable hook so you can hang a lantern (sold separately) at whatever height you want. Fabric gear-loft hangs underneath the side table to keep small items close by. Powder-coated wire frame designed to hold a garbage bag (not included) attaches to either side of the main table. REI Camp Kitchen conveniently stows in the included carry bag for easy transport to and from the campsite.
short_description: With dedicated spots for all your cooking supplies, the REI Camp Kitchen keeps you organized so you can spend less time searching for a spatula and more time hiking, biking and relaxing with friends.
